attributes.action: Change the education system and allow this school year to be repeated.
attributes.additional_details: This will give our children the best chance to gain the grades and education experience they deserve and they will be able to enter the Jobs Market at a better time.
attributes.background:
We want you to change the school start age from 5 years to 6 years and allow all children to resit the current school year. 
This will allow all children to receive the education they deserve and allow teachers to provide the learning they have trained and planned for.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

All pupils to repeat this current academic year.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
